ingredients.ingredient: ½ head cabbage, cut into thick shreds

cookingTips: Use a grill basket to prevent cabbage shreds from falling through grates
Toss cabbage frequently for even cooking and caramelization
The salty soy sauce will reduce as the cabbage cooks, intensifying flavors
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This simple recipe relies on the interplay of umami (soy), butter, and vegetables. What cooking stage should you add the butter for best results?
